Mailing Address: c/o Fair PharmaCare AdministrationPO Box 9655Stn Prov GovtVictoria, BC     V8W 9P2
Service Details: - Provides financial assistance for prescription drugs to families and individuals with low-income- Pharmacare begins assisting with the eligible costs after the deductible is reached- British Columbians with the lowest incomes do not need to meet a deductible and receive immediate assistance
Eligibility: Have a valid BC Medical Services Plan (MSP) coverage and have filed an income tax return for the relevant taxation year (that is, two years ago)
How to Apply: - Coverage begins immediately if you register by phone or online- There is no charge for registering and there are no premiums to pay
